thread.title: APG Appointed As GSA for Air Europa In PanamaTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: APG Appointed As GSA for Air Europa In PanamaTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: APG Appointed As GSA for Air Europa In PanamaTravelandtourworld.com
text:
APG Appointed As GSA for Air Europa In Panama
APG is pleased to announce a new GSA partnership with Air Europa (UX) effective from the 01st September 2015 in addition to its current GSA agreement in Cyprus.
APG has been appointed as the General Sales Agent of Air Europa in Panama and will be providing full sales and marketing services as well as call center facilities.
Air Europa is the airline of Globalia, the largest Spanish tourist group with an annual turnover of over 3,500 million dollars, founded in 1986 with its main base at Madrid Airport and bases in the airports of Barcelona and Majorca.
The SkyTeam Alliance member currently has one of the youngest fleet in the world with an average age of 5 years. It is made up of 47 modern aircrafts (20 Boeing 737-800, 12 Airbus 330-200, 2 Airbus A300-300 ,11 Embraer 195, 1 Airbus 330-300 and 1 Boeing 787) and offers flights to over 49 destinations.
Source:- APG
